events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the item is broken and has several scratches on the surface. I need help.
The system identified the reported issue as a product defect based on the customer's description of broken and scratched items.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the case regarding the reported damaged product.
Hello, I’m Julia from support. I’m sorry to hear about the damage. I’m here to assist you with resolving this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the broken and scratched areas, as well as your order number? This will help us process your request.
I’ve attached photos showing the broken parts and scratches clearly. My order number is 789456123. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the photos and information. We can offer a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible. Thank you for handling this promptly.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement item and that everything is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it looks perfect. Thank you for the excellent support!
Closing the case as the customer has confirmed satisfactory receipt of the replacement item and no further issues are reported.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about the resolution process and overall experience.
